spaceInvaders

Class CollisionsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • spaceInvaders.CollisionsManager

  • public class CollisionsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages, detects, and executes all the collisions between the lasers and aliens and player.
    Version:
    May 25, 2020
    Author:
    Matthew Wang and Christopher Kim, Period: 1, Assignment: APCS_Final_Project, Sources: TODO

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollisionsManager(Ship s, LaserCoordinator l, AlienCoordinator a)
      constructor, sets all the game objects that can collide

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int alienToLaser()
      checks collisions between the aliens and the player's lasers
      int dist(int x1, int x2, int y1, int y2)
      helper method to find the distance between 2 sprites and check if their radiuses intersect
      void laserToLaser()
      checks if a player laser and an alien laser have hit each other and removes them accordingly
      void setEC(ExplosionCoordinator eco)
      sets the explosion coordinator in order to make explosions when collisions occur
      boolean shipToAlien()
      checks if the ship has collided with an alien
      boolean shipToLaser()
      checks if the ship has been hit with an alien laser

    • Method Detail

      • alienToLaser

        public int alienToLaser()
        checks collisions between the aliens and the player's lasers
        Returns:
        how many aliens where hit, usually 0 or 1, but just in case 2 hit in the same frame

      • shipToLaser

        public boolean shipToLaser()
        checks if the ship has been hit with an alien laser
        Returns:
        true if it has been hit, false otherwise

      • shipToAlien

        public boolean shipToAlien()
        checks if the ship has collided with an alien
        Returns:
        true if it has collided with an alien, false otherwise

      • laserToLaser

        public void laserToLaser()
        checks if a player laser and an alien laser have hit each other and removes them accordingly

      • setEC

        public void setEC(ExplosionCoordinator eco)
        sets the explosion coordinator in order to make explosions when collisions occur
        Parameters:
        eco - explosion coordinator to be used

      • dist

        public int dist(int x1,
                int x2,
                int y1,
                int y2)
        helper method to find the distance between 2 sprites and check if their radiuses intersect
        Parameters:
        x1 - x of sprite 1
        x2 - x of sprite 2
        y1 - y of sprite 1
        y2 - y of sprite 2
        Returns:
        the distance between the two positions
